TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ChartEvents_MouseMoveEventHandler(int Button, int Shift, int x, int y);
.class public auto ansi sealed ChartEvents_MouseMoveEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ChartEvents_MouseMoveEventHandler(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Integer, y As Integer)
public delegate void ChartEvents_MouseMoveEventHandler(int Button, int Shift, int x, int y);

param.name: Button

span.span: The mouse button that was pressed.

param.span: 可以是下列常量之一 ： xlNoButton、 xlPrimaryButton、 xlSecondaryButton或 xlMiddleButton。

span.span: Can be one of the following constants: xlNoButton, xlPrimaryButton, xlSecondaryButton, or xlMiddleButton.

param.name: Shift
param.span: 此事件发生时，Shift、Ctrl 和 Alt 键的状态。

span.span: The state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys when the event occurred.

param.span: 可以是下列值之一或总和。ValueMeaning0 (零) 无 keys1SHIFT key2CTRL key4ALT 键

span.span: Can be one of or a sum of the following values.ValueMeaning0 (zero)No keys1SHIFT key2CTRL key4ALT key

param.name: x
param.span: 鼠标指针在图表对象的客户坐标系中的 X 坐标。

span.span: The X coordinate of the mouse pointer in chart object client coordinates.

param.name: y
param.span: 鼠标指针在图表对象的客户坐标系中的 Y 坐标。

span.span: The Y coordinate of the mouse pointer in chart object client coordinates.

summary.span: 用于 为 事件添加事件处理程序的委托 类型。

span.span: A Delegate type used to add an event handler for the event.

summary.span: 当 鼠标指针 在图表上的位置发生更改时，MouseMove 事件发生。

span.span: The MouseMove event occurs when the position of the mouse pointer changes over a chart.
